p:
Compounds 1– 6 and 9– 16 were prepared as previously described ( Schemes 1 and 2)
25–32 . Here, an updated synthetic procedure is reported. Moreover, new 1H NMR and 13 C NMR spectra of final compounds are provided in the experimental section. A fully detailed description is provided for the synthesis of new compounds 7 and 8, following the same synthetic procedure.
